fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to read data from Judy entries file.
Mutation testing is a fault-based technique that measures the efectiveness of test suites for fault localization, based on seeded faults. Mutation testing may be used to judge the efectiveness of a test set, as the test set should kill all the mutants.
Running Judy - refer to http://mutationtest.com/judy/documentation/
Judy - Java mutation tester home page www.mutationtest.com

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the judy entries file
